show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Sweet But Dangerous
content:
Prescriptions for Health, 10/1/12: · What are we Eating that is the Same as Alcohol without the Buzz? <!--more--> · Can you treat depression with NSAID’s?
· A Delicious Solution to Lower the Risk of Gout.
· Should Doctors follow science or their Gut Feelings?
· A Natural Treatment for Alzheimer’s Disease.

· It May Be Better to Shop Alone (LOL: Laughter is the best medicine J)
